item.title: A Round-Up of This Season’s Award Winning and Nominated Nonfiction
item.description: We’re looking at some must-read nonfiction award winners and a list of top-tier finalists all competing for prestigious lit awards.

item.title: Mystery, Thriller, True Crime Picks by Popular Book Clubs in 2025
item.description: Popular book clubs have chosen mysteries, thrillers, and true crime books about art thieving, a 1940s mystery, and a manhunt so far this year

item.title: DC’s Recalled Red Hood #1 Is Going for Hundreds on eBay and Other Online Markets
item.description: Plus, NY Comic Con, the 75th Peanuts anniversary, a Superman model, the Peacemaker season finale, and more.

item.title: The 2025 Winner of the Nobel Literature Prize
item.description: We've got a new Nobel Prize winner, unending censorship issues, and a new book from Phillipa Gregory

item.title: New YA Book Releases for October 22, 2025
item.description: This week's new YA releases have high school drama, family murder mystery, and journey through the world of the Aztec gods.
